Coffee is a natural colour that acts as the perfect canvas to bring other finishes and tones into your room.

products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash taupe brown electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The soft light brown roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. This splash mocha brown electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior.

products.description: Available in a range of sunny colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. Bermuda is also available in their panel and vertical ranges. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows.
